page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: BECAUSE THE AREA IS BASICALLY RURAL THE SERVICES WHICH ARE AVAILABLE TO THE POPULATION ARE LIMITED AND HAVE TO COME FROM OTHER PLACES. TRANSPORT TO THE NEARBY TOWNS IS USUALLY MADE BY PRIVATE CARS OR BY THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE.THERE ARE BUSES TO RETFORD (FINAL DESTINATION SHEFFIELD) AND GAINSBOROUGH. THESE RUN EVERY TWO HOURS DURING THE DAY WITH THE LAST BUS PASSING THROUGH THE GRID BY 2230 THERE IS NO TRAIN SERVICE PASSING THROUGH THE GRID,THE NEAREST PASSENGER SERVICES BEING AVAILABLE AT RETFORD. HERE THE SERVICES INCLUDE NORTH SOUTH INTER CITY LINES BESIDES A SERVICE TO THE WEST COAST.
